page.title: 32Home Life
page.content: Whilst nationally there have been substantial changes in the demographics following mass immigration, making the nation significantly more multicultural and with a high proportion of single parent houeholds, this has been less noticable in the Scotton area. Advances in information technology and the advent of the internet has had a profound effect on the way we live. Many people now shop online,email and skype and everyone carries a mobile telephone with a high proportion of communication undertaken by texting. Smart (internet) 'phones are becoming increasingly popular. Many people now work from home with most families having two working parents, therefore requiring increased childcare. Tastes in food are increasingly international for take-aways, ready meals and home cooking.
